metadataAttributes.Title: Applied Data Science Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Get hands-on skills for a career in data science. Learn Python, analyze and visualize data. Apply your skills to data science and machine learning.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science, Python Programming, Data Analysis, Pandas, Numpy, Jupyter notebooks, Predictive Modelling, Data Visualization (DataViz), Model Selection, Dashboards and Charts, dash, Matplotlib,
